```vue
<template>
    <div>
        <ui-number-format v-model="model">number format</ui-number-format>
        <div class="mar-v-l1">
            <pre>number: {{ number }}
formatted: {{numberFormatted}}
format: {{ model }}</pre>
        </div>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import { formatNumber } from '@goodt-common/utils/number';
import ui from './index.js';

export default {
    components: { ...ui },
    data() {
        return {
            number: 1234.567,
            model: ''
        };
    },
    computed: {
        numberFormatted() {
            return formatNumber(this.number, this.model);
        }
    }
};
</script>
```
